description:
Survive the bullet hell and defeat the bosses in the famous abstract space shooter by Kenta Cho.
-	4 Game Modes
-	40 Levels ( 160 levels combinations)
-	Addictive music tracks 

HOW TO PLAY:
Control your ship and avoid the barrage. Use the laser to destroy
the battleship of the enemy. You can cause more damage if you
fire the laser close to the enemy. When all ships are destroyed,
the game is over. The ship extends at 200,000 and every
500,000 points.

NORMAL MODE:
- Special Weapon -> Bomb.
The bomb wipes enemies bullets.
The number of bombs is displayed on the screen.

PSY MODE:
- Special Weapon -> Rolling.
As your ship grazes a bullet, the
graze meter increases. When the graze meter becomes full, the
ship becomes invincible for a while.

IKA MODE:
- Special -> Attribution change.
Your ship has two attributes,
white and black. All bullets also have these attributes, and your
ship can absorb bullets that have the same attribute.
Absorbed bullets are changed into lasers automatically.

GW MODE:
- Special -> Reflector.
To use the reflector, you have to activate special until the
reflector meter becomes empty. You can use the reflector only
if the reflector meter displays 'OK'.
